title: The Gay Old Party strikes again
author: VD
content_html: Do you know, I honestly didn’t know Ken Mehlman was supposed to be straight. I was surprised to learn that Karl Rove had been married… I always figured he was gay too. This shouldn’t surprise anyone because if you don’t understand that the Republican Party leadership is a bunch of moderate Democrats attempting to keep the Republican grass roots reasonably in line, you can’t possibly understand how American politics works.
content_text: Do you know, I honestly didn’t know Ken Mehlman was supposed to be straight.  I was surprised to learn that Karl Rove had been married… I always figured he was gay too.
